titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Rapid Response Vehicle - Description

body.p: A Rapid Response Vehicle is an AMBULANCE VEHICLE .

A Rapid Response Vehicle is a medically equipped liveried car crewed by a clinically qualified member of staff trained to deliver clinical care at the scene of an Ambulance Incident , designed to reach PATIENTS as quickly as possible, following a 999 call.
Rapid Response Vehicles can also be used to provide urgent care to lower acuity PATIENTS crewed by a member of staff qualified with advanced clinical skills.
